body_html:
Hey again.
The merged PR is not the real fix as directory names should be changed because more html files depend on old names (names with "-" not with "_").
Basically currently any single html file inside https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tensorboard/components and subdirectories has wrong paths.

@drpngx ^

body:
Hey again.
The merged PR is not the real fix as directory names should be changed because more html files depend on old names (names with "-" not with "_").
Basically currently any single html file inside https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tensorboard/components and subdirectories has wrong paths.
